description: The Sequencing Process captures the technical parameters that were used to produce sequencing output from the Sample. It links the Sample to sequencing output.

attributes.description: Key/value pairs corresponding to an entity.

items.description: A key/value pair that further characterizes an entity.

key_type.description: A semantic type that characterizes the attribute key (e.g., oxygen saturation measurement (MAXO:0000616)).

value.description: The value for an attribute (e.g., a numerical value without the units).

value_type.description: The value_type that characterizes the attribute value (e.g., percentage (SIO:001413)).

items.title: Attribute

description.description: A short description of this Sequencing Process.

index_sequence.description: A unique nucleotide sequence that is added to a sample during library preparation to serve as a unique identifier for the Sample.

name.description: A short name identifying this Sequencing Process.

sequencing_lane_id.description: The identifier of a sequencing lane.

sequencing_machine_id.description: The identifier of a sequencing machine.

sequencing_run_id.description: The identifier of a sequencing run.

title: SequencingProcess
